page.title: 19EVENTS IN NORTHWOLD
page.content: Carnival held in June.Decorated floats drive through the village.Prizes are awarded for the best in each class.It is followed by a summer fair on the school playing field. Produce Show held in September in the village hall.It is open to all residents of Northwold.Prizes are awarded in each class of vegetables, fruit and flowers. Harvest Thanksgiving Service held in October in the church. Remembrance Service is held in November in the church.It is preceded by wreath laying at the War Memorial. It commemorates the men of Northwold who died in both World Wars. Church Bazaar held in November in the village hall to aid church funds. Christingle service held in December in the church.
